On Sat, Dec 27, 2003 at 06:59:16PM -0500, Walden Mathews wrote:
> Ergo, Monitors are
> resources proper.

Yep, exactly.  We used a 201 response to indicate the URI of the monitor
(noun), and a DELETE on it would remove the subscription.  Also, each
event notification message included the URI of the monitor that produced
it.

Mark.
